did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Miscellaneous papers from the President's Office, including speeches. Also, "Reflections on the Call to Engagement," October 2004.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Miscellaneous papers from the President's Office, including speeches. Also, "Reflections on the Call to Engagement," October 2004.

descgrp.head: INFORMATION FOR USERS

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Restricted to permission of office of origin. Consult the University Archivist.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Jeffrey S. Lehman papers, #3-14-3395. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

descgrp.p: The Cornell University Archives Web Archive has a collection copies of speeches and essays given by President Lehman here, click on Archives: https://wayback.archive-it.org/2566/20140615215452/http://cornell-classic.univcomm.cornell.edu/president/history_bio_lehman.cfm#
